AffectedComponentModel.description: Details about a software or hardware component affected by or related to the vulnerability.

name.description: The name of the affected component.
name.title: Name

componentType.description: The type or category of the component.

version.description: The version of the component, if known.
version.title: Version

cpe.description: Common Platform Enumeration (CPE) for the component.
cpe.title: Cpe

description.description: A brief description of the component and its relevance.
description.title: Description

locations.description: Specific locations within this component that are relevant (e.g., vulnerable file paths, affected configurations).
locations.title: Locations

evidenceRefs.description: List of UUIDs referencing evidence items related to this component's involvement.
evidenceRefs.title: Evidencerefs

customProperties.description: A key-value map for additional custom information about this affected component.
customProperties.title: Customproperties

AffectedComponentModel.title: AffectedComponentModel

AffectedComponentTypeEnum.description:
The general type or category of the component.
Definitions based on Appendix N: `AffectedComponent.componentType` - Definitions.
AffectedComponentTypeEnum.title: AffectedComponentTypeEnum

ApplicationInfo.description:
Information about the application, system, or component that was the target of the assessment
and to which the findings apply.

name.description: The primary name of the application or target.
name.title: Name

version.description: The version of the application or target.
version.title: Version

repositoryUrl.description: URL of the source code repository for the application.
repositoryUrl.title: Repositoryurl

environment.description: The environment in which the assessment was performed or to which it applies (e.g., 'production', 'staging', 'test', 'development').
environment.title: Environment

purl.description: Package URL (PURL) identifying the overall application or target.
purl.title: Purl

cpe.description: Common Platform Enumeration (CPE) for the overall application or target.
cpe.title: Cpe

customProperties.description: A key-value map for additional custom information about the application or target.
customProperties.title: Customproperties

ApplicationInfo.title: ApplicationInfo

CodeSnippetDataModel.description: Structured data for evidenceType: CODE_SNIPPET_SOURCE, CODE_SNIPPET_SINK, or CODE_SNIPPET_CONTEXT.
CodeSnippetDataModel.title: CodeSnippetDataModel

output.description: The output produced by the command execution.
output.title: Output

exitCode.description: The exit code returned by the command.
exitCode.title: Exitcode

executionContext.description: Context in which the command was executed (e.g., 'Remote shell', 'Local terminal', 'Web shell').
executionContext.title: Executioncontext

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the command was executed. Assumed to be UTC.
timestamp.title: Timestamp

CustomScoreModel.description: Allows for representing scores from other scoring systems.
CustomScoreModel.title: CustomScoreModel

CvssV3_1Model.description: Common Vulnerability Scoring System v3.1 details.

vectorString.description: The full CVSS v3.1 vector string.
vectorString.title: Vectorstring

CvssV3_1Model.title: CvssV3_1Model

CvssV4_0Model.description: Common Vulnerability Scoring System v4.0 details.
CvssV4_0Model.title: CvssV4_0Model

CvssV4_0_BaseMetricsModel.description: CVSS v4.0 Base (Exploitability and Impact) Metric Group.
CvssV4_0_BaseMetricsModel.title: CvssV4_0_BaseMetricsModel

EvidenceModel.description: A single piece of evidence supporting the vulnerability claim.
EvidenceModel.title: EvidenceModel

EvidenceTypeEnum.description:
The type of evidence provided. The structure of the 'data' field depends on this type.
Definitions based on Appendix P: `Evidence.evidenceType` - Definitions, Usage, and Data Structure Summaries.
EvidenceTypeEnum.title: EvidenceTypeEnum

dataDescription.description: Description of the data that was exfiltrated (e.g., 'User credentials', 'Session cookie', 'PII records sample').
dataDescription.title: Datadescription

dataSample.description: A sample of the exfiltrated data. May be truncated, redacted, or a representation if sensitive.
dataSample.title: Datasample

exfiltrationMethod.description: Method or channel used for data exfiltration (e.g., 'HTTP POST to attacker server', 'DNS tunneling').
exfiltrationMethod.title: Exfiltrationmethod

destinationIndicator.description: Indicator of the destination where data was sent (e.g., attacker-controlled IP, domain, URL).
destinationIndicator.title: Destinationindicator

ExploitFlowModel.description: Describes a validated sequence of steps that demonstrate how a vulnerability can be exploited or how sensitive data flows through a system.

id.description: Unique ID for this exploit flow.
id.title: Id

title.description: A concise, human-readable title for the vulnerability.
title.title: Title

description.description: A concise description summarizing this specific exploit flow or data path.
description.title: Description

discoveryDate.description: The date and time when the vulnerability was first discovered or reported. Assumed to be UTC.
discoveryDate.title: Discoverydate

disclosureDate.description: The date and time when the vulnerability was or is planned to be publicly disclosed. Assumed to be UTC.
disclosureDate.title: Disclosuredate

discoverySource.description: Information about how or from where the vulnerability was discovered.
discoverySource.title: Discoverysource

severity.description: The overall severity assessment for this vulnerability.

category.description: A high-level classification of the vulnerability type.
category.title: Category

cwes.description: A list of Common Weakness Enumeration (CWE) identifiers relevant to this vulnerability.
cwes.title: Cwes

validatedAt.description: Timestamp of when this vulnerability was last validated as exploitable.
validatedAt.title: Validatedat

source.description: The source location where untrusted data enters the system or where the vulnerability originates.

sink.description: The sink location where the vulnerability is triggered or where sensitive data is exposed.

trace.description: An optional ordered list of steps detailing the exploit flow or data path.
trace.title: Trace

status.description: The current status of this exploit flow (e.g., Open, Remediated).

exploitabilityAssessment.description: An assessment of how easy or likely this specific flow is to be exploited.

validationHistory.description: A chronological record of validation attempts and findings related to this flow.
validationHistory.title: Validationhistory

affectedComponents.description: Components specifically involved or affected by this exploit flow.
affectedComponents.title: Affectedcomponents

remediationRecommendations.description: Specific remediation advice or recommendations for this exploit flow.
remediationRecommendations.title: Remediationrecommendations

evidence.description: Evidence supporting the exploitability of this vulnerability.
evidence.title: Evidence

tags.description: A list of keywords or tags for categorizing or filtering the vulnerability.
tags.title: Tags

references.description: A list of URLs to external advisories, write-ups, or other relevant resources.
references.title: References

primaryExploitScenario.description: Indicates if this flow is considered the primary or most representative exploit scenario among multiple flows for a single vulnerability.
primaryExploitScenario.title: Primaryexploitscenario

customProperties.description: A key-value map for additional custom information about this exploit flow.
customProperties.title: Customproperties

ExploitFlowModel.title: ExploitFlowModel

ExploitabilityAssessmentModel.description: Assessment of how easy or likely the vulnerability is to be exploited.
ExploitabilityAssessmentModel.title: ExploitabilityAssessmentModel

interactionType.description: The type of external interaction observed.

description.description: Detailed description of the external interaction observed and its relevance as evidence.
description.title: Description

targetSystemDescription.description: Description of the target system or service interacted with (e.g., 'Collaborator server', 'External DNS resolver').
targetSystemDescription.title: Targetsystemdescription

observedAt.description: Timestamp when the interaction was specifically observed (distinct from the overall evidence collection timestamp). Assumed to be UTC.
observedAt.title: Observedat

sourceIdentifier.description: Identifier for the source of the interaction (e.g., IP address, hostname from which the interaction originated).
sourceIdentifier.title: Sourceidentifier

destinationIdentifier.description: Identifier for the destination of the interaction (e.g., IP address, hostname, URL that was targeted).
destinationIdentifier.title: Destinationidentifier

requestDataSummary.description: Summary or key parts of the request data sent during the interaction (e.g., DNS query, path of HTTP request).
requestDataSummary.title: Requestdatasummary

responseDataSummary.description: Summary or key parts of the response data received, if any (e.g., DNS resolution, HTTP status and headers).
responseDataSummary.title: Responsedatasummary

customProperties.description: A key-value map for additional custom information specific to this external interaction proof.
customProperties.title: Customproperties

ExternalInteractionProofTypeEnum.description: Type of external interaction observed as proof.
ExternalInteractionProofTypeEnum.title: ExternalInteractionProofTypeEnum

GeneratorToolInfo.description: Information about the tool that generated this VXDF document.

name.description: The name of the tool that generated the VXDF document.
name.title: Name

version.description: The version of the generating tool.
version.title: Version

GeneratorToolInfo.title: GeneratorToolInfo

GraphElementModel.description: A relevant node or edge in a static analysis graph.
GraphElementModel.title: GraphElementModel

GraphElementTypeEnum.description: Type of element in a static analysis graph (node or edge).
GraphElementTypeEnum.title: GraphElementTypeEnum

LocationModel.description: Describes a specific location relevant to the vulnerability.
LocationModel.title: LocationModel

LocationTypeEnum.description:
The primary type of location being described.
Definitions based on Appendix L: `Location.locationType` - Definitions and Usage Guidance.
LocationTypeEnum.title: LocationTypeEnum

verificationSteps.description: Detailed steps taken by the human verifier.
verificationSteps.title: Verificationsteps

observedOutcome.description: The outcome observed by the verifier after performing the steps.
observedOutcome.title: Observedoutcome

testerName.description: Name or identifier of the person who performed the manual verification.
testerName.title: Testername

toolsUsed.description: A list of tools or software used during manual verification.
toolsUsed.title: Toolsused

dataTypeDescription.description: A description of the type of data contained in dataContent (e.g., 'Raw hex dump', 'Custom binary format log').
dataTypeDescription.title: Datatypedescription

dataContent.description: The actual data content for this evidence.
dataContent.title: Datacontent

encodingFormat.description: The encoding format of dataContent, if not plaintext.

PathNodeModel.description: A single node in a static analysis data flow path.
PathNodeModel.title: PathNodeModel

RelevantSettingItemModel.description: A single relevant configuration setting for the environment.
RelevantSettingItemModel.title: RelevantSettingItemModel

RuntimeLogEntryDataModel.description: Structured data for various runtime log entry evidence types.
RuntimeLogEntryDataModel.title: RuntimeLogEntryDataModel

ScaComponentIdentifierModel.description: Details identifying the vulnerable component in SCA output.
ScaComponentIdentifierModel.title: ScaComponentIdentifierModel

ScaVulnerabilityIdentifierModel.description: A specific vulnerability identifier associated with a component in SCA output.
ScaVulnerabilityIdentifierModel.title: ScaVulnerabilityIdentifierModel

imageDataBase64.description: Base64 encoded string of the image data.
imageDataBase64.title: Imagedatabase64

SeverityLevelEnum.description:
A qualitative severity level assigned to the vulnerability.
Definitions based on Appendix J: `Severity.level` - Definitions.
SeverityLevelEnum.title: SeverityLevelEnum

SeverityModel.description: Represents the severity of the vulnerability.
SeverityModel.title: SeverityModel

SoftwareStackItemModel.description: A single software component in the environment's stack.
SoftwareStackItemModel.title: SoftwareStackItemModel

StaticAnalysisGraphDataModel.description: Structured data for evidenceType: STATIC_ANALYSIS_CONTROL_FLOW_GRAPH or other graph-based static analysis evidence.
StaticAnalysisGraphDataModel.title: StaticAnalysisGraphDataModel

StaticAnalysisGraphTypeEnum.description: Type of graph represented in static analysis graph data.
StaticAnalysisGraphTypeEnum.title: StaticAnalysisGraphTypeEnum

StatusEnum.description:
The current status of this vulnerability finding within a management lifecycle.
Definitions based on Appendix K: `ExploitFlow.status` - Definitions.
StatusEnum.title: StatusEnum

StepTypeEnum.description:
The nature of this step in the flow.
Definitions based on Appendix M: `TraceStep.stepType` - Definitions.
StepTypeEnum.title: StepTypeEnum

payloadContent.description: The actual content of the test payload.
payloadContent.title: Payloadcontent

payloadDescription.description: A brief description of the payload, its purpose, or how it was crafted.
payloadDescription.title: Payloaddescription

payloadEncoding.description: The encoding format of the payloadContent, if not plaintext.

targetParameterOrLocation.description: Specifies where the payload was injected or used (e.g., URL parameter name, HTTP header, file path).
targetParameterOrLocation.title: Targetparameterorlocation

TraceStepModel.description: A single step in the data flow or exploit path.
TraceStepModel.title: TraceStepModel

ValidationEngineModel.description: Details about the validation engine or tool that performed an automated validation step.

name.description: The name of the validation engine or tool.
name.title: Name

version.description: The version of the validation engine or tool.
version.title: Version

ruleset_name.description: The name of the ruleset or policy file used by the engine, if applicable.
ruleset_name.title: Ruleset Name

ruleset_version.description: The version of the ruleset or policy file used, if applicable.
ruleset_version.title: Ruleset Version

customProperties.description: A key-value map for additional custom information about the validation engine.
customProperties.title: Customproperties

ValidationEngineModel.title: ValidationEngineModel

ValidationItemModel.description: Describes a specific validation event or check performed by a human or an automated tool.

validationId.description: Optional unique ID for this validation item.
validationId.title: Validationid

validatorName.description: Name or identifier of the validator (e.g., tester name, automated tool name).
validatorName.title: Validatorname

engineInfo.description: Details of the validation engine used, if applicable.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the validation was performed. Assumed to be UTC.
timestamp.title: Timestamp

method.description: The method used for this validation step.

conclusion.description: The outcome or conclusion of this validation step (e.g., 'Vulnerability Confirmed', 'False Positive').
conclusion.title: Conclusion

description.description: Detailed notes or observations from the validator.
description.title: Description

evidenceRefs.description: List of UUIDs referencing evidence items supporting this validation.
evidenceRefs.title: Evidencerefs

reproducibilityNotes.description: Notes on how to reproduce this validation step or its findings.
reproducibilityNotes.title: Reproducibilitynotes

customProperties.description: A key-value map for additional custom information about this validation item.
customProperties.title: Customproperties

ValidationItemModel.title: ValidationItemModel

ValidationMethodEnum.description:
The primary method used to obtain or validate this specific piece of evidence as proof of exploitability.
Definitions based on Appendix O: `Evidence.validationMethod` - Definitions.
ValidationMethodEnum.title: ValidationMethodEnum

VariableStateModel.description: State of a relevant variable at the time of debugger capture.
VariableStateModel.title: VariableStateModel

VulnerabilityIdSystemEnum.description: The system or namespace of a vulnerability identifier in SCA output.
VulnerabilityIdSystemEnum.title: VulnerabilityIdSystemEnum

description: The root model for a Validated Exploitable Data Flow (VXDF) document.

vxdfVersion.description: The version of the VXDF specification to which this document conforms. MUST be '1.0.0'.
vxdfVersion.title: Vxdfversion

id.description: A unique identifier for this VXDF document instance.
id.title: Id

generatedAt.description: The timestamp indicating when this VXDF document was generated. Assumed to be UTC.
generatedAt.title: Generatedat

generatorTool.description: Information about the tool that generated this VXDF document.

applicationInfo.description: Information about the application, system, or component that was the target of the assessment.

exploitFlows.description: One or more detailed exploit flows or data paths demonstrating vulnerabilities.
exploitFlows.title: Exploitflows

customProperties.description: A key-value map for top-level custom information related to this VXDF document.
customProperties.title: Customproperties

title: VXDFModel
